Insert the ride request made by user

Passenger can get driver details who accepted the ride request

post.summary: When a driver start ride then this api update database accordingly
Ride started and after each specific time interval this API will update the root lat long value
This api trigger when ride ends by driver, and mark the ride as completed with storing the lat and long values
